review_title: A great environment for student workers but an academic bureaucracy
pros:
- Great environment for student workers to learn a lot in the chosen fields or applied sciences
- Very flexible scheduling for student workers
cons: - Office politics are horrendous, and departmental funding is unpredictable as a result

pros: Most employees are happy and nice to work with.

review_title: coordinator and academic advisor, speech instructor
job_title: Coordinator and Advisor in Anna, IL
pros: I am friendly and people oriented with good service.   I like physical work.
cons: Icy weather that you have to be out in in order to get the packages there.
